titles.title: Grazing Advisory Board Reauthorization Act
To amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to reauthorize grazing advisory boards.
Grazing Advisory Board Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary:
Grazing Advisory Board Reauthorization Act
This bill reauthorizes provisions relating to the establishment and maintenance of grazing advisory boards by the Department of the Interior and the Department of Agriculture until 10 years after the enactment of this bill.
